author: ETA PRIME
description:
We built a super Budget gaming pc for $230 and installed real Steam OS on it!
Official SteamOS runs amazingly on the low cost gaming pc and it cost less than a Steam Deck!
Powered by an 8 core i7 9700 and backed by an AMD Radeon RX 5500 XT with 8GB of V-ram this set up runs games like a boss using Steam OS and we have all the bells a whistles you need for a smooth gaming experience! #SteamOS #GamingSetup #SteamDeckAlternative #PCGaming
